short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Photo booth camera for Chrome and ChromeOS

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
UPDATE: sry camera was broken for a while but i fixed it now xo

You deserve a photo taking application that is pretty and simple and works.

Take a picture ! Choose effects ! Snap a shot ! Share with friends !

It's a packaged app, so it feels like a native app and opens in its own window.
See your face on camera. Choose from 9 effects. It's like a photobooth!
